overview: "Sext'd" - it's all about an "in your face sexy" text message wrongly sent to a dashing professor! In "Personal Assistant", the young inept assistant gets fired and then fired up by her handsome movie star boss. "Power Training" features a sensuous young thing training to win the coach. And "My Boyfriend's Dad" says it all. Hot, sexy, gorgeous, innocent young babes and the older men they lust after.
tagline: Looking for love in all the wrong places
title: Father Figure 6
